With Hurricane Milton set to make landfall in Florida this week, just a couple weeks after Heleneâ€™s impact, we wanted to reach out to remind you of the free support that Chime is offering you or anyone else affected by the storms.
Weâ€™d like to pass along some resources to help you, provided through SBP, a national disaster recovery organization. They can help you find reliable information and resources, including digital recovery tools, tips on submitting claims, avoiding post-disaster scams, and more. Learn more about SBPâ€™s offerings here.
Weâ€™re here for you, and hope you and your loved ones stay safe during these tough times.
